name: MEC Explorer Stretch Shorts - Children
description:
Comfy for the classroom and tough for the trails, these versatile shorts are a great day-to-day option for budding adventurers. The Explorer Stretch Shorts are made from the same stretchy nylon fabric as our popular men's Mochilero Pants, and provide excellent mobility and UV protection.The pull-on elastic waist makes for quick changes for gym class or swim sessions at the lake.Made of stretch-woven nylon and spandex with a DWR (durable water repellency) finish to shed water and dirt.Fabric provides a UPF 50+ rating.Pull-on elastic waist with faux fly.2 front pockets and a side zippered pocket.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Tight, with no room to spare.





Very close fit, with a bit of room.





Generous, but not oversized.





Oversized with lots of room for layers.


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability
